title: Jeremy Pena of Houston Astros Wins World Series MVP
description: Jeremy Peña had big shoes to fill when Carlos Correa left the Houston Astros. Peña responded by being named the most valuable player of the A.L.C.S. and the World Series.
dc:creator: James Wagner
media:credit: Annie Mulligan for The New York Times
media:description: Jeremy Peña went 10 for 25 with a home run in the World Series. He had 20 hits this postseason.
